title: What Natalie Imbruglia can expect in her first year as a solo new mum (by someone who's been through it)
text:
“My heart is bursting,” wrote singer and solo mum Natalie Imbruglia when announcing the birth of her son, Max Valentine, this week. Her words reminded me of the wonderful combination of joy, love and relief I felt when meeting my daughter, Astrid, and more recently, my son Xavi. This was balanced by a huge sense of responsibility because, like Natalie, I’m a solo parent who used a sperm donor to become a mother.

I hope Natalie enjoys the wonderful simplicity that comes from looking after a newborn solo. I found that during the first few weeks of motherhood I did little else except cuddle, feed and look into my daughter’s eyes, as I was able to ignore everything except my relationship with my...
